column2: mod1 <- lm(quality ~ alcohol + volatile_acidity + sulphates + citric_acid, data = red_clean )
mod2 <- lm(quality ~ alcohol + volatile_acidity + sulphates + citric_acid + total_sulfur_dioxide, data = red_clean )

    citric_acid, data = red_clean)

lm(formula = quality ~ alcohol + volatile_acidity + sulphates + 
    citric_acid + total_sulfur_dioxide, data = red_clean)

mod1 <- lm(quality ~ alcohol + volatile_acidity + sulphates + total_sulfur_dioxide, data = red_clean )
